column3: An efficient multi-objective evolutionary approach for solving the operation of multi-reservoir system scheduling in hydro-power plants.
column4: Carolina Gil Marcelino; Gabriel M. C. Leite; Carla A. D. M. Delgado; Lucas B. de Oliveira; Elizabeth F. Wanner; Silvia Jiménez-Fernández; Sancho Salcedo-Sanz
